information: Worked on deep learning and computer vision projects related to Bachelor's thesis.
Developed models for multiple sclerosis lesion segmentation in brain MRI images.
Under the supervision of Prof. Hassan Khotanlou.
Designed end-to-end medical image processing pipelines for classification and segmentation.
Worked with imbalanced and noisy datasets for robust model development.
Developed OCR, object detection, and tracking systems.
Designing and deploying end-to-end multi-modal models, including Speech-to-Text pipelines.
Developing AI-powered solutions for telecom data processing.
Optimizing machine learning models for large-scale applications.
Instructor for 'Computer Fundamentals and Programming Workshop (C Language)'.
Designed coursework and guided students in hands-on programming exercises.
Assisted in grading and evaluating assignments.
Assisted in multiple courses including 'Artificial Intelligence & Expert Systems', 'Operating Systems', and 'Data Structures'.
Conducted tutorials, reviewed assignments, and provided guidance to students.
Collaborated with professors to improve course content and learning resources.
